oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medical Certificate of Sgt. George Thomas, Co. D, 52nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a medical certificate from the Ladies Hospital in Montgomery, Ala. dated Nov. 20, 1863 for Sgt. George Thomas, Co. D, 52nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He was furloughed and deemed unfit for military service due to a gun shot wound. Thomas' daughter, later married Sgt. John Jennings, a veteran of the 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA.
